string.name: reason_location
string.value: Allow applications to obtain device location information in pedometer scenarios.

string.name: reason_background
string.value: Allow applications to run continuously in the background in pedometer scenarios.

string.name: reason_activity_motion
string.value: Allow the application to read the user's current motion status in the pedometer scenario.

string.name: reason_location_in_background
string.value: Allow applications to obtain device location information when running in the background of pedometer scenarios.
